definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: The problem is that whenever antimatter comes into contact with regular matter, the two annihilate.
sentences.chinese: 反物質一旦接觸到普通物質，兩者即會同時湮滅。

sentences.english: For proponents of the anti-stuff movement, renting is in.
sentences.chinese: 對反物質運動的支持者來說，租賃現正流行。

sentences.english: We do not have to worry about military applications.
sentences.chinese: 我們不必擔心反物質在軍事上的應用。

sentences.english: Antimatter, which annihilates matter upon contact, seems to be rare in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 接觸物質時會將其毀滅的反物質似乎在宇宙中很罕見。

sentences.english: CERN, said anti-matter as a "mirror of the universe."
sentences.chinese: 歐洲核子研究中心稱，反物質就像是“宇宙的鏡子”。
因爲黃金的振動能改變反物質。

sentences.english: Scientists agree that Pion antimatter powered spacecraft may approach the speed of light.
sentences.chinese: 科學家認爲，介子反物質動力飛船可能接近光的速度。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: lit. Lord Ye's passion for dragons (idiom)/fig. to pretend to be fond of sth while actually fearing it/ostensible fondness of sth one really fears
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1
